application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1	Cherry Tree	Rear Garden of 49Thin regrowth by 20%, removing longer shoots to retain natural form and slightly decrease volume, with an emphasis on clearing branches growing towards adjacent Katsura Tree by 2.5m.Remove dead branches.The tree's current height is 11m and crown spread is 10mAfter the proposed works, the tree's height is 11m and the crown spread is 9m.T2. Ash Tree	Rear Garden of 49-Northern Most Tree:Remove dead branches over 2.5cm in diameter and carry out a climbing Inspection to focus on branch and junction structure.The tree's current height is 19m and crown spread is 14mAfter the proposed works, the tree's height is 19m and the crown spread is 14m.T3. Ash Tree	Rear Garden of 49:Remove dead branches over 2.5cm in diameter.Carry out a climbing Inspection to focus on branch and junction structure.The tree's current height is 19m and crown spread is 14mAfter the proposed works, the tree's height is 19m and the crown spread is 14m.G4.	Evergreen Magnolia x 3	Rear Garden:Lightly reduce height and spread by 1m to manage size, without compromising screening.The tree's current height is 9m and crown spread is 4mAfter the proposed works, the tree's height is 8m and the crown spread is 3m.T6	American Sweet Gum	Front of 49:This regrowth by 20% by selectively removing longer shoots to help manage crown density and slightly reduce canopy size. Lightly lift canopy to clear hedge.Remove dead branches.The tree's current height is 19m and crown spread is 14mAfter the proposed works, the tree's height is 18m and the crown spread is 13m.G7	Katsura Tree x 2	Rear Garden:Defoliated early, possibly weather related, sometimes as discussed, they can be affected by spring frosts:a- Tree closest to house:Subordinately prune codominant low stemand formatively prune remainder of tree, removing weak, crossing and supressed branches.b- Tree closest to Cherry:Formatively prune remainder of tree, removing weak, cro...
